original_text: David understood what God would do in a future time. He did not speak about himself, but he spoke about the Messiah. He said that God would cause this man to become alive again after his death. God would not let him remain in Hades, the place for dead people. Nothing would destroy his body.
korean_text: 미리 본 고로 그리스도의 부활을 말하되 그가 음부에 버림이 되지 않고 그의 육신이 썩음을 당하지 아니하시리라 하더니

sentences.original_text: David understood what God would do
He did not speak about himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자신에 대해 말하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: but he spoke about the Messiah
He said that God would cause this man
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이 사람을 일으키실 것이라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: to become alive again after his death
sentences.korean_translation: 죽음 후에 다시 살게 될 것이라고

sentences.original_text: God would not let him remain in Hades
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그가 하데스에 머무르지 않게 하실 것이라고
아무것도 그의 몸을 파괴하지 못할 것이라고
